solution_line_template: First find how many cars have valid tickets: {valid_tickets_percent_num}% * {total_cars} cars = <<{valid_tickets_percent_num}*{percent_factor}*{total_cars}={cars_with_valid_tickets}>>{cars_with_valid_tickets} cars
Then find the percentage of cars with parking passes: {valid_tickets_percent_num}% / {parking_pass_divisor} = {parking_pass_percent_num}%

Then multiply that number by the total number of cars to find the number with parking passes: {parking_pass_percent_num}% * {total_cars} cars = <<{parking_pass_percent_num}*{percent_factor}*{total_cars}={cars_with_parking_passes}>>{cars_with_parking_passes} cars

Then subtract all the cars with valid forms of parking to find the number parked illegally: {total_cars} cars - {cars_with_valid_tickets} cars - {cars_with_parking_passes} cars = <<{total_cars}-{cars_with_valid_tickets}-{cars_with_parking_passes}={cars_parked_illegally}>>{cars_parked_illegally} cars
